title: Dr Qing Liu Website
cleaned_text: Qing Liu, (OMD - Oriental Medical Doctor) AcuHerbs Clinic, Tucson, AZ. L. Ac, Dipl. Ac, Dipl CH, by (NCCAOM) National board certified in Acupuncture and Chinese Herbology by the National Certification Commission for Acupuncture and Oriental Medicine. Licensed in Acupuncture in State of Arizona. Graduated with a degree in Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) from Nanjing University of Traditional Chinese Medicine in 1982. 30+ Years of Clinical Experience Practicing Chinese traditional herbal medicine and acupuncture in China and in the United States of America. Currently, she has her own private practice in Tucson, Arizona and also teaches at the Arizona School of Acupuncture and Oriental Medicine. Full Range of Services Including traditional Chinese medicine (herbology, acupuncture and moxibustion) with an emphasis on pain relief, chronic conditions, medical rehabilitation, women's health, wellness, respiratory diseases, sports injuries, depression and stress management. Insurance Coverage Do you have insurance coverage? Some insurance policies are covered. Call for insurance verification.
